name: Mixpanel for Startups
description: Offers one year of free access to its Growth plan for startups that launched less than five years ago and have less than $8 million in funding.

name: Segment Startup Program
description: Eligible startups get full access to Segment's Team Plan (up to $25,000 value) free for up to two years.

name: Amplitude for Startups
description: Provides one year of Amplitude's paid Growth plan features for free to eligible startups.

name: Instabug for Startups
description: Offers eligible startups a discount on all plans, providing real-time contextual insights to build better apps.

name: Zoho One for Startups
description: A bundle of 40 different applications for both web and mobile. Eligible startups get a one-year free subscription.

name: Freshworks for Startups
description: Enables developers, partners, and customers to customize, integrate, and automate business workflows.

name: DeepSource Startup Program
description: Provides early-stage startups easy access to best-in-class developer tools and software-building infrastructure.

name: Hatch by DigitalOcean
description: Helps developers create, launch, and scale their startups with perks including 12 months of DigitalOcean credit.

name: AWS Activate
description: Provides startups with AWS credits, technical support, and training to help grow their business.

name: Startup with IBM
description: Offers $120,000 in free IBM Cloud credits to put businesses on the path to transformative growth.

name: Google Cloud for Startups
description: Empowers startups to grow with the same tools and infrastructure used to build Google. Offers Cloud credits, community events, and training.

name: Microsoft for Startups
description: Provides access to technical resources, free Azure cloud, and opportunities to sell alongside Microsoft salespeople and partners.

name: Alibaba Startup Program
description: A global program focused on accelerating business success for startups.

name: Oracle for Startups
description: Delivers a unique acceleration program enabling partnerships for startups, their customers, and Oracle, starting with free cloud.

name: Clever UP Program
description: An IT Automation platform managing all ops work while you focus on business value.

name: Heroku is for Startups
description: Provides resources to quickly get started on Heroku, including platform credits, technical support, and networking.

name: Scaleway Startup Program
description: Cloud computing partnership program designed for startups, offering access to public cloud infrastructure and technical assistance.

name: MongoDB for Startups
description: Free MongoDB Atlas credits, access to technical advisors, and more.

name: ScaleGrid Startup Program
description: 50% off on fully managed hosting plans for MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, and MongoDB.

name: Knowlarity Startup Program
description: Knowlarity’s easy-to-integrate voice solutions deployed on the cloud enables startup businesses to kickstart their operations in no time

name: Twilio Startups Program
description: Aims to serve startup founders globally through education, mentoring, and introductions.

name: MyOperator Startup Program [INDIA ONLY]
description: Provides a full-fledged call management ‘startup kit’ that helps manage business calls and enhances customer experience at zero cost.

name: Exotel for Startups [INDIA ONLY]
description: Gives startups access to all of Exotel’s features through a special account.

name: MSG91 for Startups [INDIA ONLY]
description: Offers a complimentary communication API package with 25,000 SMS credits every month for 6 months.

name: Dialpad for Startups
description: Provides qualified startups with 10 free, lifelong seats of Dialpad Talk (business phone lines) and UberConference (video conferencing).

name: Agora for Startups
description: Aims to support entrepreneurs and developers incorporating live voice and video into their applications with cutting-edge real-time engagement solutions.

name: Intercom Early Stage Program
description: Helps build customer relationships through conversational experiences. Eligible startups get all Pro products at a flat rate for up to one year.

name: GoSquared Early Stage Plan
description: Provides all GoSquared features for a fixed, low price for the first year to help grow your SaaS business.

name: Zendesk for Startups
description: Provides qualifying net new startup customers access to Zendesk's full family of products at a 100% discount for their first 6 months.
promotion: 6 months free for up to 100 agents

name: Help Scout for Startups
description: Offers everything needed to start talking with customers and growing your business. First year is just $50/month for eligible startups.

name: Drift for Early Stage Startups
description: Provides 93% off of the Essential Plan for 1 year, helping to speed up sales cycles and increase pipeline.

name: Crisp Startup Program
description: Used to provide a modern customer lifecycle experience, generating more qualified leads and improving customer satisfaction.

name: StackPath Propel Startup Program
description: Provides qualifying early-stage companies with 12 months of free Edge Delivery 2000 credits, tech and business mentoring, and access to exclusive events.

name: Postmark
description: Offers $75 account credit to startups that have launched their product, are charging for it, and haven’t taken outside investment.

name: SendGrid Accelerate
description: A program to help startups succeed with 12 months of product credit, mentoring, and networking opportunities.

name: SOLIDWORKS 3DEXPERIENCE® Works for Startups Program
description: Offers software, training, and co-marketing resources at no cost to eligible early-stage hardware startups.

name: Autodesk Fusion 360 for Startups
description: Eligible for startups less than three years old with fewer than 10 employees and under $100,000 USD in gross annual revenue.

name: Zenduty Early Stage Startup Program
description: An incident management platform providing end-to-end incident alerting and response orchestration. Eligible startups get $3,000 in credits valid for 1 year.

name: Razorpay Zero Plan [INDIA ONLY]
description: Offers zero transaction fees for the first 6 months (for a maximum transaction volume of ₹1 lakh per month) to kickstart online payments.

name: Chargebee Launch Programme
description: Makes managing subscription billing easier. Get the first USD 50k in revenue for free.

name: HubSpot for Startups
description: Provides marketing, sales, and customer service tools at startup-friendly pricing up to 90% off.

name: Gumlet
description: An all-in-one video infrastructure product that helps store, transcode, and stream video files. Eligible startups get $10,000 in credits valid for 12 months.

name: Shotstack Startup Program
description: Enables startups to build innovative video applications with their cloud-based video-editing API infrastructure. Eligible startups get $5,000 in credits valid for 12 months.

name: Esri Startup Program
description: A global three-year program that helps startups build mapping and location intelligence into their products and businesses.

name: MATLAB and Simulink for Startups
description: Eligible early-stage technology startups can get MATLAB, Simulink, and more than 90 industry-specific toolboxes at a startup-friendly price.
promotion: Access to software at discounted rates

name: FeedBear
description: Affordable feedback management for early-stage startups. Eligible startups get all features for just $29/month for up to one year.

name: Remote for Startups
description: Designed to help you legally and compliantly employ global talent with world-class payroll, tax, benefits, and compliance solutions at a fraction of the cost.

name: Pareto Security
description: A suite of essential macOS security apps for small businesses. Use the coupon code STARTUP at checkout for a discount.
